question: I have an application through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace but have not enrolled, I believe I could be eligible to enroll using a Qualifying Life Event based on my income. How can I enroll in Virginia's Insurance Mark using this Qualifying Life Event?
text:
I have an application through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace but have not enrolled, I believe I could be eligible to enroll using a Qualifying Life Event based on my income. How can I enroll in Virginia's Insurance Mark using this Qualifying Life Event?
          
        
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace has added a new qualifying life event for new customers who have an annual household income equal to or below the 150% federal poverty level. Below is a table that shows the income amount.
"Household / Family Size","Income 150% FPL"
"Single","$19 320"
"2-person","$26 130"
"3-person","$32 940"
"4-person","$39 750"
"6-person","$53 370"
"8-person","$66 990"

For other family sizes, please
to this link
.
If you think you are eligible and you currently have an application through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace but have not enrolled in a plan, you will need to re-submit your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace application.
